attributes.name: Suspicious Command Line Activity - Enumeration
attributes.description: Detects suspicious command-line activity indicative of reconnaissance and enumeration techniques on Windows systems, leveraging data from Security and System logs.
attributes.query: (winlog.channel:"Security%" OR winlog.channel:"System%") AND (process.command_line:"*ipconfig /all*" OR process.command_line:"*netsh interface show interface*" OR process.command_line:"*netsh interface firewall show all*" OR process.command_line:"*arp -a*" OR process.command_line:"*nbtstat -n*" OR process.command_line:"*net config*" OR process.command_line:"*net group /dom*" OR process.command_line:"*net group \"Domain Admins\" /dom*" OR process.command_line:"*route print*" OR process.command_line:"*curl www.ip-api.com*" OR process.command_line:"*dnscmd*" OR process.command_line:"*ldifde.exe -f c:\\windows\\temp\\*.txt -p subtree*" OR process.command_line:"*netlocalgroup*" OR process.command_line:"*netsh interface portproxy show*" OR process.command_line:"*netstat -ano*" OR process.command_line:"*reg query hklm\\software\\*" OR process.command_line:"*systeminfo*" OR process.command_line:"*tasklist /v *" OR process.command_line:"*wmic volume list brief*" OR process.command_line:"*wmic service brief*" OR process.command_line:"*wmic product list brief*" OR process.command_line:"*wmic baseboard list brief*" OR process.command_line:"*wevtutil qe security /rd:true /f:text /q:%[System[(EventID=4624)]%*")
